page.title: 04BLURTON, TRENTHAM, BARLASTON
page.content:
Next we crossed the road leading to Hem Heath colliery and arrived at Magdalen Road, where we saw two public playing fields.
Near to the top of Magdalen Road we saw a public house. We then continued on our way and arrived back at school to sort out all the information we had collected.
My general impression of the area was that it was all very nice and pleasant and that there was nothing that spoiled the looks of everywhere else. The people I met were very nice to me and everyone we spoke to was keen to help us in our project.
